00070 //  The following section of code implements a Command observer
00071 //  used to monitor the evolution of the registration process.
00072 //
00073 #include "itkCommand.h"
00074 class CommandIterationUpdate : public itk::Command
00075 {
00076 public:
00077   typedef  CommandIterationUpdate   Self;
00078   typedef  itk::Command             Superclass;
00079   typedef itk::SmartPointer<Self>  Pointer;
00080   itkNewMacro( Self );
00081 protected:
00082   CommandIterationUpdate() {};
00083 public:
00084   typedef itk::RegularStepGradientDescentOptimizer     OptimizerType;
00085   typedef   const OptimizerType   *    OptimizerPointer;
00086 
00087   void Execute(itk::Object *caller, const itk::EventObject & event)
00088     {
00089       Execute( (const itk::Object *)caller, event);
00090     }
00091 
00092   void Execute(const itk::Object * object, const itk::EventObject & event)
00093     {
00094       OptimizerPointer optimizer =
00095         dynamic_cast< OptimizerPointer >( object );
00096       if( ! itk::IterationEvent().CheckEvent( &event ) )
00097         {
00098         return;
00099         }
00100       std::cout << optimizer->GetCurrentIteration() << "   ";
00101       std::cout << optimizer -> GetCurrentStepLength() << "   ";
00102       std::cout << optimizer->GetValue() << "   ";
00103 
00104       std::cout << optimizer->GetCurrentPosition() << std::endl;
00105     }
00106 };

00109 int main( int argc, char *argv[] )

00111 
00112   const char *referenceName = NULL;
00113   const char *toutName = NULL, *invToutName = NULL, *maskName = NULL;
00114   const char *mgradName = NULL, *mgradResampled = NULL;
00115 
00116   TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("Registers diffusion to anatomical data.", ' ', "Unversioned");
00117 
00118   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> inputArg("i","input","Diffusion sequence",true,"","string",cmd);
00119   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> referenceArg("r","reference","Anatomical image",true,"","string",cmd);
00120   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outputArg("o","output","Registered diffusion sequence",true,"","string",cmd);
00121   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> maskArg("m","mask","Mask for the b0 image",false,"","string",cmd);
00122   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> mgradArg("","mean-gradient","Mean gradient",false,"","string",cmd);
00123   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> mgradResampledArg("","mean-gradient-resampled","Mean gradient resampled",false,"","string",cmd);
00124 
00125   // TODO: is this way of passing rois useful? If not, consider removing it ...
00126 
00127   TCLAP::ValueArg<unsigned int> x1Arg("","x1","x min of ROI in diffusion (default is 0)",false,0,"int",cmd);
00128   TCLAP::ValueArg<unsigned int> x2Arg("","x2","x max of ROI in diffusion (default is 0)",false,0,"int",cmd);
00129 
00130   TCLAP::ValueArg<unsigned int> y1Arg("","y1","y min of ROI in diffusion (default is 0)",false,0,"int",cmd);
00131   TCLAP::ValueArg<unsigned int> y2Arg("","y2","y max of ROI in diffusion (default is 0)",false,0,"int",cmd);
00132 
00133   TCLAP::ValueArg<unsigned int> z1Arg("","z1","z min of ROI in diffusion (default is 0)",false,0,"int",cmd);
00134   TCLAP::ValueArg<unsigned int> z2Arg("","z2","z max of ROI in diffusion (default is 0)",false,0,"int",cmd);
00135 
00136   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> toutArg("","transformation","Estimated transformation"
00137       " (from b0 to the reconstructed image).",false,"","string",cmd);
00138   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> invToutArg("","inverse-transformation","Inverse of the"
00139       " estimated transformation (from reconstructed image to b0 )",false,"","string",cmd);
00140 
00141   TCLAP::SwitchArg nnSwitch("","nn","Nearest neighbor interpolation", cmd, false);
00142   TCLAP::SwitchArg bsplineSwitch("","bspline","BSpline interpolation", cmd, false);
00143 
00144   // Parse the argv array.
00145   cmd.parse( argc, argv );
00146 
00147   referenceName  = referenceArg.getValue().c_str();
00148   maskName       = maskArg.getValue().c_str();
00149   mgradName      = mgradArg.getValue().c_str();
00150   mgradResampled = mgradResampledArg.getValue().c_str();
00151 
00152   unsigned int x1 = x1Arg.getValue();
00153   unsigned int x2 = x2Arg.getValue();
00154 
00155   unsigned int y1 = y1Arg.getValue();
00156   unsigned int y2 = y2Arg.getValue();
00157 
00158   unsigned int z1 = z1Arg.getValue();
00159   unsigned int z2 = z2Arg.getValue();
00160 
00161   bool roiIsSet = false;
00162 
00163   if ( (x1>0) || (x2>0) || (y1>0)  || (y2>0)  || (z1>0)  || (z2>0) )
00164     roiIsSet = true;
00165 
00166   toutName = toutArg.getValue().c_str();
00167   invToutName = invToutArg.getValue().c_str();
00168 
00169   char inputName[255];
00170   strcpy( inputName, (char*)inputArg.getValue().c_str() );
00171   strcat ( inputName,".nii" );
00172 
00173   char bvec[255];
00174   strcpy( bvec, (char*)inputArg.getValue().c_str() );
00175   strcat ( bvec,".bvec" );
00176 
00177   char bval[255];
00178   strcpy(  bval, (char*)inputArg.getValue().c_str() );
00179   strcat (  bval,".bval" );
00180 
00181   char outputName[255];
00182   strcpy( outputName, (char*)outputArg.getValue().c_str() );
00183   strcat ( outputName,".nii.gz" );
00184 
00185   char bvec_out[255];
00186   strcpy( bvec_out, (char*)outputArg.getValue().c_str() );
00187   strcat ( bvec_out,".bvec" );
00188 
00189   char bval_out[255];
00190   strcpy( bval_out, (char*)outputArg.getValue().c_str() );
00191   strcat ( bval_out,".bval" );

00235   TransformType::Pointer      transform     = TransformType::New();
00236   OptimizerType::Pointer      optimizer     = OptimizerType::New();
00237   InterpolatorType::Pointer   interpolator  = InterpolatorType::New();
00238   RegistrationType::Pointer   registration  = RegistrationType::New();

00241   registration->SetTransform(    transform    );
00242   registration->SetInterpolator( interpolator );

00254   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< ImageType  >   ImageReaderType;
00255   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< SequenceType > SequenceReaderType;
00256 
00257   ImageReaderType::Pointer    imageReader    = ImageReaderType::New();
00258   SequenceReaderType::Pointer sequenceReader = SequenceReaderType::New();
00259 
00260   imageReader    -> SetFileName( referenceName );
00261   sequenceReader -> SetFileName( inputName );
00262 
00263   imageReader    -> Update();
00264   sequenceReader -> Update();
00265 
00266   ImageType::Pointer    reference = imageReader -> GetOutput();
00267   SequenceType::Pointer input     = sequenceReader -> GetOutput();
00268   ImageType::Pointer    mgrad;
00269 
00270   if ( strcmp(mgradName,"") )
00271   {
00272     ImageReaderType::Pointer    mgradReader    = ImageReaderType::New();
00273     mgradReader -> SetFileName( mgradName );
00274     mgradReader -> Update();
00275     mgrad = mgradReader -> GetOutput();
00276   }

00278   // Extract B0 from sequence
00279 
00280   typedef itk::ExtractImageFilter< SequenceType, ImageType > ExtractorType;
00281   ExtractorType::Pointer extractor = ExtractorType::New();
00282 
00283   extractor -> SetInput( input );
00284 
00285   SequenceType::SizeType  size  = input -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize();
00286   SequenceType::IndexType index = input -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetIndex();
00287 
00288   unsigned int inputLength = size[3];
00289 
00290   size[3]  = 0;
00291 
00292   SequenceType::RegionType region;
00293   region.SetIndex(index);
00294   region.SetSize(size);
00295 
00296   extractor -> SetExtractionRegion( region );
00297   extractor -> SetDirectionCollapseToSubmatrix();
00298   extractor -> Update();
00299 
00300   ImageType::Pointer b0 = extractor -> GetOutput();
00301 
00302   registration -> SetFixedImage( b0 );
00303   registration -> SetMovingImage( reference );
00304 
00305   // Fixed image region
00306 
00307   ImageType::RegionType fixedImageRegion;
00308   ImageType::IndexType  fixedImageRegionIndex;
00309   ImageType::SizeType   fixedImageRegionSize;
00310 
00311   if ( strcmp(maskName,"") )
00312   {
00313     MaskReaderType::Pointer maskReader = MaskReaderType::New();
00314     maskReader -> SetFileName( maskName );
00315     maskReader -> Update();
00316 
00317     MaskType::Pointer mask = MaskType::New();
00318     mask -> SetImage( maskReader -> GetOutput() );
00319 
00320     fixedImageRegion = mask -> GetAxisAlignedBoundingBoxRegion();
00321     metric -> SetFixedImageMask( mask );
00322   } else if ( roiIsSet )
00323     {
00324       fixedImageRegionIndex[0] = x1; fixedImageRegionIndex[1]= y1; fixedImageRegionIndex[2]= z1;
00325       fixedImageRegionSize[0]  = x2 - x1 + 1; fixedImageRegionSize[1] = y2 - y1 + 1; fixedImageRegionSize[2] = z2 - z1 + 1;
00326 
00327       fixedImageRegion.SetIndex(fixedImageRegionIndex);
00328       fixedImageRegion.SetSize(fixedImageRegionSize);
00329     } else
00330       {
00331         fixedImageRegion = b0 -> GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00332       }
00333 
00334   fixedImageRegionIndex = fixedImageRegion.GetIndex();
00335   fixedImageRegionSize  = fixedImageRegion.GetSize();
00336 
00337   registration -> SetFixedImageRegion ( fixedImageRegion );
00338 
00339   // Center of rotation
00340 
00341   ImageType::IndexType  centerIndex;
00342   ImageType::PointType  centerPoint;
00343 
00344   centerIndex[0] = fixedImageRegionIndex[0] + fixedImageRegionSize[0] / 2.0;
00345   centerIndex[1] = fixedImageRegionIndex[1] + fixedImageRegionSize[1] / 2.0;
00346   centerIndex[2] = fixedImageRegionIndex[2] + fixedImageRegionSize[2] / 2.0;
00347 
00348   b0 -> TransformIndexToPhysicalPoint(centerIndex, centerPoint);
00349 
00350   transform -> SetIdentity();
00351   transform -> SetCenter( centerPoint );
00352

00354   typedef RegistrationType::ParametersType ParametersType;
00355 
00356   ParametersType initialParameters( transform->GetNumberOfParameters() );
00357   initialParameters = transform->GetParameters();
00358 
00359   registration->SetInitialTransformParameters( initialParameters );
00360 
00361   std::cout << "Initial parameters = " << initialParameters << std::endl;
00362 
00363   optimizer->MinimizeOn();
00364   optimizer->SetMaximumStepLength( 0.2 );
00365   optimizer->SetMinimumStepLength( 0.001 );
00366   optimizer->SetNumberOfIterations( 300 );
00367 
00368   typedef OptimizerType::ScalesType       OptimizerScalesType;
00369   OptimizerScalesType optimizerScales( transform->GetNumberOfParameters() );
00370 
00371   optimizerScales[0] =  1.0;
00372   optimizerScales[1] =  1.0;
00373   optimizerScales[2] =  1.0;
00374   optimizerScales[3] =  1.0;
00375   optimizerScales[4] =  1.0;
00376   optimizerScales[5] =  1.0;
00377   optimizerScales[6] =  1.0;
00378   optimizerScales[7] =  1.0;
00379   optimizerScales[8] =  1.0;
00380   optimizerScales[9] =  1/1000.0;
00381   optimizerScales[10] =  1/1000.0;
00382   optimizerScales[11] =  1/1000.0;
00383 
00384   optimizer->SetScales( optimizerScales );
00385 
00386   // Create the Command observer and register it with the optimizer.
00387   //
00388   CommandIterationUpdate::Pointer observer = CommandIterationUpdate::New();
00389   optimizer->AddObserver( itk::IterationEvent(), observer );
00390 
00391 
00392   try
00393     {
00394     registration->StartRegistration();
00395     }
00396   catch( itk::ExceptionObject & err )
00397     {
00398     std::cerr << "ExceptionObject caught !" << std::endl;
00399     std::cerr << err << std::endl;
00400     return EXIT_FAILURE;
00401     }

00403   ParametersType finalParameters = registration->GetLastTransformParameters();
00404 
00405   TransformType::Pointer finalTransform = TransformType::New();
00406

00408   finalTransform->SetCenter( centerPoint );

00410   // Calculate inverse transform (anat -> diffusion)
00411 
00412   TransformType::Pointer inverseTransform = TransformType::New();
00413   inverseTransform -> SetIdentity();

00415   inverseTransform -> SetParameters( finalTransform -> GetParameters() );
00416   inverseTransform -> GetInverse( inverseTransform );
00417

00420   SequenceType::SpacingType  spacing  = input -> GetSpacing();
00421 
00422   typedef itk::JoinSeriesImageFilter< ImageType, SequenceType > JoinerType;
00423   JoinerType::Pointer joiner = JoinerType::New();
00424   joiner -> SetOrigin( 0.0 );
00425   joiner -> SetSpacing( spacing[3] );
00426 
00427   typedef itk::ResampleImageFilter<
00428                             ImageType,
00429                             ImageType >    ResampleFilterType;
00430 
00431   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < inputLength; i++)
00432   {
00433      index[3] = i;
00434 
00435      SequenceType::RegionType desiredRegion;
00436      desiredRegion.SetSize(  size  );
00437      desiredRegion.SetIndex( index );
00438 
00439      extractor -> SetExtractionRegion( desiredRegion );
00440 
00441      ResampleFilterType::Pointer resample = ResampleFilterType::New();
00442 
00443      resample -> SetTransform( inverseTransform );
00444      resample -> SetInput( extractor -> GetOutput() );
00445      resample -> SetUseReferenceImage( true );
00446      resample -> SetReferenceImage( reference );
00447      resample -> SetDefaultPixelValue( 0 );
00448 
00449      if ( nnSwitch.isSet() )
00450      {
00451        NNInterpolatorType::Pointer nnInterpolator = NNInterpolatorType::New();
00452        resample -> SetInterpolator(nnInterpolator);
00453      } else if ( bsplineSwitch.isSet() )
00454        {
00455          BSplineInterpolatorType::Pointer bsplineInterpolator = BSplineInterpolatorType::New();
00456          bsplineInterpolator -> SetSplineOrder(3);
00457          resample -> SetInterpolator(bsplineInterpolator);
00458        }
00459 
00460 
00461      resample -> Update();
00462 
00463      joiner -> SetInput( i, resample -> GetOutput() );
00464   }
00465 
00466   joiner -> Update();

00470 
00471   typedef itk::ImageFileWriter< ImageType >  ImageWriterType;
00472 
00473   if ( strcmp(mgradName,"") )
00474   {
00475     ResampleFilterType::Pointer resample = ResampleFilterType::New();
00476 
00477     resample -> SetTransform( inverseTransform );
00478     resample -> SetInput( mgrad );

00480     resample -> SetReferenceImage( reference );

00491     // Write resampled sequence
00492 
00493   typedef itk::ImageFileWriter< SequenceType >  WriterType;
00494 
00495   WriterType::Pointer writer =  WriterType::New();

00500 
00501   // Change and write gradient table
00502 
00503   typedef btk::DiffusionGradientTable< SequenceType > GradientTableType;
00504   GradientTableType::Pointer gradientTable = GradientTableType::New();
00505 
00506   vnl_matrix<double> R(3,3);
00507   R.set_identity();
00508 
00509   R = inverseTransform -> GetMatrix().GetVnlMatrix();
00510 
00511   vnl_matrix<double> PQ = R;
00512   vnl_matrix<double> NQ = R;
00513   vnl_matrix<double> PQNQDiff;
00514 
00515   for(unsigned int ni = 0; ni < 100; ni++ )
00516   {
00517     // Average current Qi with its inverse transpose
00518     NQ = ( PQ + vnl_inverse_transpose( PQ ) ) / 2.0;
00519     PQNQDiff = NQ - PQ;
00520     if( PQNQDiff.frobenius_norm() < 1e-7 )
00521     {
00522 //      std::cout << "Polar decomposition used " << ni << " iterations " << std::endl;
00523       break;
00524     }
00525     else
00526     {
00527       PQ = NQ;
00528     }
00529   }
00530 
00531   typedef itk::Euler3DTransform<double> EulerTransformType;
00532   EulerTransformType::Pointer eulerTransform = EulerTransformType::New();
00533 
00534   eulerTransform -> SetRotationMatrix( NQ );
00535 
00536   gradientTable -> SetNumberOfGradients( inputLength );
00537   gradientTable -> SetImage( input );
00538   gradientTable -> SetTransform( eulerTransform );
00539   gradientTable -> LoadFromFile( bvec );
00540   gradientTable -> RotateGradientsInWorldCoordinates();
00541   gradientTable -> SaveToFile( bvec_out);
00542 
00543   // Write b-values
00544 
00545   // Write b-values
00546   char clcopybval[255];
00547   sprintf(clcopybval,"cp %s %s",bval,bval_out);
00548   system(clcopybval);

00552

00554 
00555   if (strcmp(toutName,""))
00556   {
00557     TransformWriterType::Pointer transformWriter = TransformWriterType::New();
00558     transformWriter -> SetFileName ( toutName );
00559     transformWriter -> AddTransform( finalTransform );
00560

00562     {
00563       transformWriter -> Update();

00571   }
